    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3286</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Contemporary Holocaust plays in advanced EFL classes.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeitgenössische Holocaust Spiele in 
hochentwickelten EFL Kategorien.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le contemporain joue Holocauste dans les classes 
avançées d'EFL.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogos contemporary de Holocaust em classes 
avançadas de EFL.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giochi contemporanei di Holocaust nei codici 
categoria avanzati di EFL.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύγχρονα παιχνίδια ολοκαυτώματος στις προηγμένες 
κλάσεις EFL.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Juegos contemporáneos de Holocaust en clases 
avanzadas de EFL.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An article in which Gunther Volk, a teacher trainer of English in Germany, explains how the use of Holocaust drama can make for highly effective English lessons</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">teaching strategies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">drama</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">holocaust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">history</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Artikel, in dem Gunther Volk, ein Lehrerkursleiter von
Englisch in Deutschland, erklärt, wie der Gebrauch von Holocaust 
Drama für in hohem Grade wirkungsvolle englische Lektionen bilden 
kann</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un article en lequel Gunther Volk, un entraîneur de 
professeur de l'anglais en Allemagne, explique comment l'utilisation 
Holocauste du drame peut conduire aux leçons anglaises fortement 
pertinentes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um artigo em que Gunther Volk, um instrutor do professor 
do inglês em Germany, explica como o uso do drama de Holocaust pode 
fazer para lições inglesas altamente eficazes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un articolo in cui Gunther Volk, un addestratore 
dell'insegnante dell'inglese in Germania, spiega come l'uso del dramma
di Holocaust può portare alle lezioni inglesi altamente efficaci</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα άρθρο στο οποίο Gunther Volk, ένας 
εκπαιδευτής δασκάλων των αγγλικών στη Γερμανία, εξηγεί πώς η 
χρήση του δράματος ολοκαυτώματος μπορεί να κάνει για τα 
ιδιαίτερα αποτελεσματικά αγγλικά μαθήματα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un artículo en el cual Gunther Volk, un amaestrador del 
profesor del inglés en Alemania, explica cómo el uso del drama de 
Holocaust puede hacer para las lecciones inglesas altamente eficaces</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Strategien</string>
